reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson's lectures are incredibly engaging and informative. She makes complex topics easy to understand.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Prof. Lee's enthusiasm for physics is contagious. His demonstrations in class really bring the concepts to life.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Chen's research-based teaching approach is outstanding. She's always up-to-date with the latest developments in the field.
